chapter.title: Introduction to &ceph; on &caasp;
chapter.para: &rook; allows you to run &ceph; on &kube; to provide container workloads all their storage needs. Part of the &productname; family is the &rook; deployment which runs on &caasp;.
The &rook; deployment is currently only available to nominated and approved customers: it is in limited availability. Contact your &suse; sales team on how to get nominated.

&rook; is a so-called storage operator; it automates many steps that you need to do manually in a "traditional" setup with &cephadm;. This guide explains how to install Rook after you installed &caasp; and how to administrate it.
